title: maravakaraanava
sahitya:
maravakarA nava manmatha rUpuni



caraNam 1



 nItO mellani mATO kannula tETO valuvATO manasA

   

caraNam 2



 kulukO pAvula gilikO kApUramu palukO cekkula talukO manasA

   

caraNam 3



 villO ghaNTala ghallO sumamuna yillO sEvapu koLLo manasA

   

caraNam 4



 kElO vungarAlO bangAruyyAlO centa nillalO manasA

   

caraNam 5



 sharamO kanakAmbaramO shrIkara yuramO brOcu dUramO manasA

   

caraNam 6



 A jnAnamu hrd-rAjIvamutO pUjintura tyAgarAja nutuni manasA
